pusty.f0i.parser

Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • pusty.f0i.parser.Parser

  • public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object
    Parses NASM code into pseudo machine code. Is also able to load and save pseudo machine code binaries.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Parser(java.lang.String fileHandle)
      A Parser instance.

      • tickParser

        public int tickParser()
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Ticks the Parser by one. Either parses a Line (parseLine(java.lang.String, java.util.ArrayList<pusty.f0i.parser.CommandNode>, java.util.ArrayList<pusty.f0i.parser.MemoryNode>)) or preCompiles a Node (preCompileNode(pusty.f0i.parser.Node, java.util.ArrayList<pusty.f0i.parser.CommandNode>, java.util.ArrayList<pusty.f0i.parser.MemoryNode>, int))
        Returns:
        current mode or -1 if it's done
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - something went wrong

      • setInternal

        Parameters:
        b - true = load internal files; false = load external files

      • trimString

        public static java.lang.String trimString(java.lang.String line)
        Trims a command line to a usable format. It removes unnecessary tabs, whitespace, comments and makes strings to single chars (also optimized for macro parsing)
        Parameters:
        line - the line to trim
        Returns:
        the trimmed line

      • getLabel

        public static java.lang.String getLabel(java.lang.String line)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets the label of the given line (if it contains one) by trimming it and removing the Command and the Data from the String
        Parameters:
        line - the line which to check
        Returns:
        the label. null if no Label was found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throws when more than one Label was found

      • getCommand

        public static java.lang.String getCommand(java.lang.String line)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets the command of the given line (if it contains one) by trimming it and removing the Label and the Data from the String
        Parameters:
        line - the line which to check
        Returns:
        the command. null if no Command was found
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throws when more than one Command was found

      • getData

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getData(java.lang.String line)
                                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets the data of the given line (if it contains data) by trimming it and removing the Label and the Command from the String
        Parameters:
        line - the line which to check
        Returns:
        an ArrayList with the data of the line. Returns a ArrayList with the size zero when no data is found.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if more than one command or more than one label was found

      • parseCommand

        public static Node parseCommand(java.lang.String line)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Parses a line into a Node by trimming and splitting it into a label (if it contains one), a command (if it contains one} and the necessary data
        Parameters:
        line - command line to parse
        Returns:
        either a CommandNode, a MemoryNode, a MacroNode or zero if the Node couldn't be parsed
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - couldn't handle the command in line
